annotations.dataview-recent-files:
markdown:
My own plugin to show the recently modified files.
[[2024-06-13 Survey group culture]]

![[00 Meta/Misc/Test.jpg]]

[[2024-08-05 Review Cs-based Rydberg quantum computers]]
annotations.dataview: Super-useful plugin that allows querying the notes to provide database functionality. üî•üî•üî•
annotations.obsidian-completr: Allows auto-completion of commands. Very useful.
annotations.find-unlinked-files: Very useful to find orphaned files and broken links.
annotations.homepage: Useful to show a customized homepage.
annotations.import-attachments-plus: My own plugin to import attachments by moving them into the vault.
annotations.languagetool: It is claimed to be better but it does not work. It is still in beta function.
annotations.number-headings-obsidian: Very useful to add numbers to the headings.
annotations.pdf-plus: Very useful to comment PDF documents in Obsidian.
annotations.obsidian-tasks-plugin: Not really useful. Never used so far.
annotations.obsidian-style-settings: Super useful to customize the style with CCS and be able to modify the settings from Obsidian.
annotations.obsidian-smart-typography: Semi useful to improve typography of symbols.
annotations.wikilinks-to-mdlinks-obsidian: Not really needed. It converts Wikilinks to MD links.
annotations.webpage-html-export: Super useful to export in HTML. It is a bit clunky to load. It is per default disabled, unless I need it.
annotations.frontmatter-modified-date: Very useful to update the property `modified date`.
annotations.supercharged-links-obsidian: The idea is very nice but then the MD notes are not really readable outside of Obsidian. Disabled for now.
annotations.tag-wrangler: Very useful to rename tags across all notes.
annotations.sheets: Useful to extend tables and merge cells.
annotations.obsidian-html-plugin: It allows opening HTML files in Obsidian.
annotations.callout-manager: Offers a GUI to customize callouts.
annotations.obsidian-file-path-to-uri: Not really needed. It converts a file path to a URI.
annotations.obsidian-text-expander-js: Quite powerful to run inline scripts, and replace predefined macros. However, not really used.
annotations.omnisearch: Powerful tool to search through the vault.
annotations.obsidian-outliner: Very handy to operate on outlines.
annotations.url-into-selection: Not really needed. It causes more confusion when pasting on existing selected text.
annotations.periodic-notes: Manages daily notes. Just used for daily notes.
annotations.settings-search: Adds a search field with a fuzzy search functionality to search through Obsidian settings.
annotations.text-extractor: I did not really test it how good it works.
annotations.file-explorer-note-count: Very useful to display the number of notes in the various folders.
annotations.plugins-annotations: My own plugin to take notes about installed plugins.
annotations.editing-toolbar: Nice toolbar shown above the notes. Quite handy.
annotations.obsidian-spaced-repetition: Super effective plugin to learn flashcards.
annotations.table-editor-obsidian: A must to operate on tables in Obsidian. üöÄüöÄüöÄ
annotations.obsidian-admonition: Improve callouts üñãÔ∏è. They can be¬†entered as `codeblocks`.
annotations.obsidian-divide-and-conquer: Plugin useful to debug problems with plugins. Generally, it can be left disabled.
annotations.js-engine: Allows executing Javascript dynamically in the note.
annotations.plugin-reloader: Allows reloading a specific plugin without restarting Obsidian. Hotkeys configurable.
